017package org.microbean.type;
018
019import java.lang.constant.Constable;
020import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
021import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
022import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
023
024import java.lang.reflect.Type;
025import java.lang.reflect.WildcardType;
026
027import java.util.Optional;
028
029import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
030
031import static org.microbean.type.ConstantDescs.CD_Type;
032import static org.microbean.type.ConstantDescs.CD_UpperBoundedWildcardType;
033
034/**
035 * A {@link WildcardType} implementation that has only {@linkplain
036 * WildcardType#getUpperBounds() upper bounds}.
037 *
038 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
039 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
040 *
041 * @see WildcardType
042 *
043 * @see WildcardType#getUpperBounds()
044 */
045public final class UpperBoundedWildcardType extends AbstractWildcardType implements Constable {
046
047
048  /*
049   * Constructors.
050   */
051
052
053  /**
054   * Creates a new {@link UpperBoundedWildcardType}.
055   *
056   * @param upperBound the sole {@linkplain
057   * WildcardType#getUpperBounds() upper bound}; may be {@code null}
058   * in which case an array consisting solely of {@link Object
059   * Object.class} will be used instead
060   */
061  public UpperBoundedWildcardType(final Type upperBound) {
062    super(upperBound == null ? (Type[])null : new Type[] { upperBound }, null);
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Creates a new {@link UpperBoundedWildcardType}.
067   *
068   * @param upperBounds the {@linkplain
069   * WildcardType#getUpperBounds() upper bounds};
070   * may be {@code null}
071   */
072  // It is critical that upperBounds remain a varargs parameter, not
073  // an array type. See JavaTypes::describeConstable(WildcardType).
074  public UpperBoundedWildcardType(final Type... upperBounds) {
075    super(upperBounds, null);
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Creates a new {@link UpperBoundedWildcardType}.
080   *
081   * @param wildcardType the {@link WildcardType} whose {@link
082   * WildcardType#getUpperBounds() upper bounds} will be effectively
083   * copied; may be {@code null}
084   * in which case an array consisting solely of {@link Object
085   * Object.class} will be used instead
086   */
087  public UpperBoundedWildcardType(final WildcardType wildcardType) {
088    super(wildcardType == null ? new Type[] { Object.class } : wildcardType.getUpperBounds(), null);
089  }
090
091
092  /*
093   * Instance methods.
094   */
095
096
097  @Override // Constable
098  public final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
099    final Type[] upperBounds = this.getUpperBounds();
100    // Upper bounded (extends).
101    final int bsmInvokeArgumentsLength = upperBounds.length + 1;
102    final ConstantDesc[] bsmInvokeArguments = new ConstantDesc[bsmInvokeArgumentsLength];
103    bsmInvokeArguments[0] = MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(CD_UpperBoundedWildcardType, CD_Type.arrayType());
104    for (int i = 1; i < bsmInvokeArgumentsLength; i++) {
105      final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> arg = JavaTypes.describeConstable(upperBounds[i - 1]);
106      if (arg.isEmpty()) {
107        return Optional.empty();
108      }
109      bsmInvokeArguments[i] = arg.orElseThrow();
110    }
111    return Optional.of(DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE, bsmInvokeArguments));
112  }
113
114
115  /*
116   * Static methods.
117   */
118
119
120  /**
121   * If the supplied {@link WildcardType} is a {@link
122   * UpperBoundedWildcardType}, returns it; otherwise creates a new
123   * {@link UpperBoundedWildcardType} with the supplied {@link
124   * WildcardType}'s {@linkplain WildcardType#getUpperBounds() upper
125   * bounds} and returns it.
126   *
127   * @param wildcardType the {@link WildcardType} to effectively copy
128   * (or return); may be {@code null} in which case upper bounds
129   * consisting of an array consisting solely of {@link Object
130   * Object.class} will be used instead
131   *
132   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link UpperBoundedWildcardType}
133   *
134   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code wildcardType} is {@code
135   * null}
136   *
137   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
138   *
139   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
140   * that it may return a new {@link UpperBoundedWildcardType} with
141   * each invocation).
142   *
143   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
144   * threads.
145   */
146  public static final UpperBoundedWildcardType of(final WildcardType wildcardType) {
147    if (wildcardType instanceof UpperBoundedWildcardType w) {
148      return w;
149    } else {
150      return new UpperBoundedWildcardType(wildcardType);
151    }
152  }
153
154
155}
